mystery_attributes: Had heated argument with Victoria before her death
Victoria was threatening to expose her relationship with Nova
Last person to publicly interact with victim

value.circumstance: first_class seat next to Timmy, 31-75 minutes
events: Instructed Timmy to gather industry gossip from passengers
Victoria threatened to expose her relationship with Nova

value.action: reviewing documents for new designer deal
events: Unaware of Victoria's death until commotion began

history: Former protégé who surpassed her mentor
Recently threatened by Victoria's desperate tactics
known_secrets: Victoria's magazine was in serious financial trouble

history: Hired her for her cutting writing style
In a secret relationship that Victoria threatened to expose
known_secrets: Nova witnessed her argument with Victoria

history: Loyal assistant who executes her bidding
Unaware he hired Gideon to investigate Victoria
known_secrets: His obsessive desire to impress her

history: Gave her a position after the forgery scandal
Values her art expertise for magazine features
known_secrets: Her continuing guilt about the forgeries she authenticated

agenda.primary_goal: Secure exclusive designer contracts for her magazine

state_of_mind.worries: Victoria's threats to expose her relationship with Nova

sentence_style: speaks confidently with occasional bursts of passionate emphasis
speech_quirks: often references future trends rather than past ones
subtly steers conversations away from her personal life
calls everyone 'darling' in varying tones that convey her true feelings
common_phrases: The future of fashion demands innovation

penelope_argument.content: Yes, Victoria and I had words in the dining_car. It was a professional disagreement about designer exclusivity contracts, nothing more.

penelope_relationship.content: Victoria threatened to expose my relationship with Nova as some kind of industry scandal. She was desperate for attention, trying to save her failing magazine.
